article: a tainan-based university hospital has completed the development of a movement assistant system for paralyzed patients , which uses a unk detector to sense the user 's thoughts and directs its mechanical components to act accordingly , the system 's developers said thursday .
abstract: hospital develops unk movement assistant for paralyzed patients
